page.title: 05EDUCATION AROUND WILLINGDON
page.content: There are seven state schools in our area providing education for the 5-16 year olds. Infant: Parkland Infant School Primary: Willingdon C P School, Willingdon Trees C P School Junior: Parkland Junior School Comprehensive: Hampden Park School, Willingdon Comprehensive School Special Day School: Lindfield School In addition to the above there is a Youth Centre at Hampden Park School providing various sporting facilities, and a Centre for Adult Education at Willingdon Comprehensive School where evening classes are given in a number of different subjects. There are a few playgroups such as the one which uses a mobile classroom at Willingdon C P School. Children with hearing difficulties attend a unit at Willingdon C P School
